description: Detects scheduled task creation events that include suspicious actions, and is run once at 00:00
author: pH-T (Nextron Systems)
name: Uncommon One Time Only Scheduled Task At 00:00
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\schtasks.exe*") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"schtasks.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*wscript*" OR "*vbscript*" OR "*cscript*" OR "*wmic\ *" OR "*wmic.exe*" OR "*regsvr32.exe*" OR "*powershell*" OR "*\\AppData\\*") AND (process.command_line.text:"*once*" AND process.command_line.text:"*00\:00*"))
